name: Frisian Dew
description: Frisian Dew, Dutch Passion’s pride and joy, is a 50/50 hybrid first bred in 2008 by combining Super Skunk and Purple Star. Expressing itself in hues of either green or deep purple, Frisian Dew delivers powerfully euphoric effects with an aroma of spicy pine and citrus. Frisian Dew plants are hardy, mold-resistant, and grow well in Northern European climates. Outdoor flowers will ripen around the beginning of October, while indoor gardens finish their flowering in just 7 to 8 weeks.
descriptionPlain: Frisian Dew, Dutch Passion’s pride and joy, is a 50/50 hybrid first bred in 2008 by combining Super Skunk and Purple Star. Expressing itself in hues of either green or deep purple, Frisian Dew delivers powerfully euphoric effects with an aroma of spicy pine and citrus. Frisian Dew plants are hardy, mold-resistant, and grow well in Northern European climates. Outdoor flowers will ripen around the beginning of October, while indoor gardens finish their flowering in just 7 to 8 weeks.

highlightedReviews.text: Grew this here at Rainbeaux Farms,  Portland Oregon  Medical Marijuana Growers after  a long search finding a mellow out strain to mostly control PTSD. Found it has many successful interactions with other symptoms of other medical conditions.  Will add photos of this to allow you to identify the strain from fakes.

I can't even imagine what would have been my life today if I didn't grow this strain... It helped me a lot dealing with depression.
Not to strong, colourful strain with a summer taste, if you suffer from depression you can stop here, it's in my opinion one of the best strains to fight against lack of happiness.
Combine it with a physical activity is what saved me :)

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Big Bang, Frisian Dew, Green Poison, Jamaican Lion, and Purple Gorilla
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
Ask and you shall receive, good people of Leafly. Elected by you, this week's new strains include Big Bang, Frisian Dew, Green Poison, Jamaican Lion, and Purple Gorilla. Read more about each variety below, and if you've come across any of these newcomers in your own strain hunting, enlighten us with a strain review. Keep the tips coming!
   1. Big Bang
Characteristics of Big Bang:

80% indica
Cross between Skunk, Northern Lights, and El Niño
Breeder: Green House Seeds
Apple, rose, and violet aroma
Possesses sedating, calming, and stress-relieving qualities
May help with pain, sleeplessness, and anxiety
Indoor flowering time of 8 to 9 weeks

   2. Frisian Dew
Characteristics of Frisian Dew:

50/50 hybrid
Cross between Super Skunk and Purple Star
Breeder: Dutch Passion
Spicy, pine, and citrus aroma
Delivers powerfully euphoric effects and full-body relaxation
Indoor flowering time of 7 to 8 weeks

   3. Green Poison
Characteristics of Green Poison:

70% indica
Breeder: Sweet Seeds
Fruity, floral aroma
Brings body numbness and cerebral euphoria
May help with pain, insomnia, muscle spasms, and appetite loss
Indoor flowering time of 7 weeks

   4. Jamaican Lion
Characteristics of Jamaican Lion:

High-CBD sativa strain
Breeder: Shadrock
Sweet herbal aroma
Delivers mildly psychoactive effects as well as elevated sensory perception, focus, and creativity
May help with pain, anxiety, and inflammation
Indoor flowering time of 8 to 9 weeks

   5. Purple Gorilla
Characteristics of Purple Gorilla:

60% indica-dominant hybrid
Grape, cherry, and citrus aroma
Has relaxing, "couch-lock" effects
May help with pain, insomnia, migraines, and muscles spasms
Indoor flowering time of 7 to 8 weeks
